CSAT_REPORTS.NO_RECORDS: Il n'y a aucune réponse à l'enquête CSAT disponible.
CSAT_REPORTS.DOWNLOAD_FAILED: Le téléchargement des rapports CSAT a échoué

SATISFACTION_SCORE.LABEL: Score de satisfaction
SATISFACTION_SCORE.TOOLTIP: Nombre total de réponses positives / Nombre total de réponses * 100

RESPONSE_RATE.LABEL: Taux de réponse
RESPONSE_RATE.TOOLTIP: Nombre total de réponses / Nombre total de messages de l'enquête CSAT envoyés * 100

TOTAL_CONVERSATIONS.LABEL: No. of Conversations
TOTAL_CONVERSATIONS.TOOLTIP: Total number of conversations handled by the bot

TOTAL_RESPONSES.LABEL: Total Responses
TOTAL_RESPONSES.TOOLTIP: Total number of responses sent by the bot

RESOLUTION_RATE.LABEL: Resolution Rate
RESOLUTION_RATE.TOOLTIP: Total number of conversations resolved by the bot / Total number of conversations handled by the bot * 100

HANDOFF_RATE.LABEL: Handoff Rate
HANDOFF_RATE.TOOLTIP: Total number of conversations handed off to agents / Total number of conversations handled by the bot * 100

ACCOUNT_CONVERSATIONS.LOADING_MESSAGE: Chargement des métriques de la conversation...

AGENT_CONVERSATIONS.NO_AGENTS: Il n'y a aucune conversation par des agents

SLA_REPORTS.NO_RECORDS: SLA applied conversations are not available.

INPUT_PLACEHOLDER.INBOXES: Nom de la boîte de réception

HIT_RATE.LABEL: Hit Rate
HIT_RATE.TOOLTIP: Percentage of SLAs created were completed successfully

NO_OF_MISSES.LABEL: Number of Misses
NO_OF_MISSES.TOOLTIP: Total SLA misses in a certain period

NO_OF_CONVERSATIONS.LABEL: Number of Conversations
NO_OF_CONVERSATIONS.TOOLTIP: Total number of conversations with SLA
